title: Service disruption on Circle Line due to fault.

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Fault cleared trains are progressively returning to normal between #HarbourFront, #MarinaBay and #DhobyGhaut. Train service is still available.
[CCL] UPDATE: Fault cleared trains are progressively returning to normal between #HarbourFront, #MarinaBay and #DhobyGhaut.
[CCL]: Additional 15 mins train travel time between #HarbourFront, #MarinaBay and #DhobyGhaut due to a signal system fault.
